 - Southern Seven-Star Formation: Change all orbs to Fire, Wood & Light orbs.
 - Eastern Seven-Star Formation: Change all orbs to Water, Wood & Dark orbs.
 - Northern Seven-Star Formation: Change all orbs to Wood, Light & Dark orbs.
 - Western Seven-Star Formation: Change all orbs to Fire, Water & Dark orbs.
 - Orb Refresh: Replace all orbs
 - Hell Ball: Inflict 200 Dark damage on all enemies. Change Water orbs to Dark orbs.
